apis.name: Advanced Search API
apis.description: Search globally across the GitLab instance.

attributes.name: scope
attributes.description: The scope to search in

attributes.name: search
attributes.description: The search query

attributes.name: state
attributes.description: Filter by state. Issues and merge requests are supported; it is ignored for other scopes.

attributes.name: confidential
attributes.description: Filter by confidentiality. Issues scope is supported; it is ignored for other scopes.

attributes.name: order_by
attributes.description: Allowed values are created_at only. If this is not set, the results are either sorted by created_at in descending order for basic search, or by the most relevant documents when using advanced search.

attributes.name: sort
attributes.description: Allowed values are asc or desc only. If this is not set, the results are either sorted by created_at in descending order for basic search, or by the most relevant documents when using advanced search.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the group owned by the authenticated user
